title: New Age Hyper Burning and Burning World!
content: The New Age update is here, and Hyper Burning is back once again until February, with Burning World and Burning World Step Up to take you all the way to Lv. 260!

title: Maple Memo: v.246 New Age Update Clarification
content: Weâ€™d like to provide context and information regarding community concerns about information that was recently revealed about the v.246 update, and explain the future direction of MapleStory.

title: [Updated November 15] v.246 - New Age: 6th Job Patch Notes
content: Click here to read the patch notes for v.246 - New Age: 6th Job.

title: Cash Shop Update for November 15
content: Philosopher's Book, Royal Styles, Red Snail's Adventurer Package, Ili Pika Pets, and more!

title: [Completed] Scheduled Game Update - November 15, 2023
content: We will be performing a scheduled game update on Wednesday, November 15, 2023 at 5:00 AM PST (8:00 AM EST / 2:00 PM CET / 12:00 AM AEDT).

title: What's Your MapleStory? - Skywired
content: We take a look at some of the great stories that our players have had with MapleStory over the years!
